title: Vaibhav Diamond Kada Bangles - Sparkling Tradition
features: Modern, sleek design with prong-set brilliant cut diamonds. Features a contemporary geometric pattern along the band, with a high-polish Hyderabadi finish. The angular form is a modern take on the traditional kadiyam, making it a versatile piece.
occasions: and everyday wear. Perfect for the modern South Indian woman.
description: Combines the timeless appeal of gold with the brilliance of diamonds. Expertly crafted with superior quality materials, these bangles offer lasting value and a touch of contemporary elegance. A truly unique and head-turning design.
